short_summary: Request for Proposal for Aircraft De-icer Spares with delivery at 25CFSD Montreal and 7CFSD Edmonton with 90 days lead-time
full_summary:
---

### Aircraft De-Icer Spares

**Notice ID:** cb-252-97724907  
**Amendment:** 3  
**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246805  
**Publication Date:** November 24, 2023  
**Closing Date:** January 9, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Contract Information:**

* **Contract Start Date:** Not specified  
* **Contract End Date:** Not specified  
* **Contract Status:** Expired  
* **Region of Delivery:** Canada

**Request for Proposal:**

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of Aircraft De-Icer Spares. The delivery of the items is requested at 25 Cold Weather Operations Wing, Montreal, and 7 Wing, Edmonton, within 90 days of contract award.

**Scope of Work:**

* The bidder is required to submit a proposal detailing the following items:
	+ Bearings and bushings
	+ Electrical lugs, plugs, and connectors
	+ Electrical relays and accessories
	+ Coil duct heaters
	+ Heater elements
	+ Valves
	+ Pumps
	+ Pump parts and accessories
	+ Filters
	+ Water filters
	+ Oil filters
	+ Transducers
	+ Temperature and heat measuring instruments

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* The lowest price will be the sole evaluation criterion for this procurement.

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive open bidding will be used to select the most suitable bidder.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bids must be submitted by email only to dlp5-4bidsreceiving-daat5-4receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca  
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.  

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Marie-Claude Théorêt  
* Email: marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca  
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

**Attachments:**

* English version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25788/w8476-246805---de-icer-spares---rfp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25788/w8476-246805---de-icer-spares---rfp_eng.pdf)  
* French version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/web
